title: Ray Tracing Performance On An Intel GPU Is Weird...
description: *Video Sponsor* Get Some Corsair Dom Plat Epeen here:   I try some ray tracing on Intel's new A770 graphics cards, and it was a bit of a weird experience.  Some Micro Center links for your viewing pleasure:  -Shop Intel Arc A770 Graphics Card:   -Shop Top Deals on ALL Processors:   Get some AWESOME Dawid T-shirts, Mouse pads and more here:   Help us buy weird computers and tech to make videos on by 'Joining' the channel on YouTube here:   Or you can support the channel on Patreon:   *Follow me on whichever Social media you don't hate* Discord:  Twitch:  Twitch bits on YouTube:
